casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Brenda Sanders Lanclos No. 414P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 Kirby H. Smith, III, Attorney at Law, Thomas A. Kellis, II, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for Lanclos, Brenda Sanders. Neal T. McHenry, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of November 2016 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."
